item.title: GraphQL-Europe: A trip to Berlin
item.description: Last weekend my colleagues Will, Michael, Oskar, and I went to Berlin to spend Sunday at the GraphQL Europe conference in Berlin. Neo4j sponsored the conference as we’ve been experimenting with building a GraphQL to Neo4j integration and wanted to get some feedback from the community as well as learn what’s going on in GraphQL land. Will and Michael have written about their experience where they talk more about the hackathon we hosted so I’ll cover it more from a personal perspective.
